    • Enum Constant Summary

      Enum Constants 
      Enum Constant and Description
      ACTION
      Take photos of fast moving objects.
      AUTO
      Scene mode is off.
      BARCODE

      BEACH

      Capture the naturally warm color of scenes lit by candles.

      STEADY_PHOTO

      • AUTO

        public static final SceneMode AUTO
        Scene mode is off.

      • ACTION

        public static final SceneMode ACTION
        Take photos of fast moving objects. Same as SPORTS.

      • PORTRAIT

      • THEATRE

        public static final SceneMode THEATRE
        Take photos in a theater. Flash light is off.

      • BEACH

        public static final SceneMode BEACH
        Take pictures on the beach.

      • SNOW

        public static final SceneMode SNOW
        Take pictures on the snow.

      • SUNSET

        public static final SceneMode SUNSET
        Take sunset photos.

      • STEADY_PHOTO

        public static final SceneMode STEADY_PHOTO
        Avoid blurry pictures (for example, due to hand shake).

      • FIREWORKS

        public static final SceneMode FIREWORKS
        For shooting firework displays.

      • SPORTS

        public static final SceneMode SPORTS
        Take photos of fast moving objects. Same as ACTION.

      • PARTY

        public static final SceneMode PARTY
        Take indoor low-light shot.

      • CANDLELIGHT

        public static final SceneMode CANDLELIGHT
        Capture the naturally warm color of scenes lit by candles.

      • BARCODE

        public static final SceneMode BARCODE
        Applications are looking for a barcode. Camera driver will be optimized for barcode reading.

      • HDR

        public static final SceneMode HDR
        Capture a scene using high dynamic range imaging techniques. The camera will return an image that has an extended dynamic range compared to a regular capture. Capturing such an image may take longer than a regular capture.
